file_content.text: Thanks for the blasters, Captain. And uh, good luck out there.
Can't believe you made it through that separatist shooting gallery, Captain. Your ship isn't even scratched.
It takes guts landing in the middle of a battlefield. Nice flying.
I owe it all to my lightning reflexes and crackerjack timing.
It was easy.
You've clearly had lots of practice getting shot at.
Battlefield?
The separatists are invading this village, attacking everybody who isn't one of them.
Why would anyone fight over this dump of a world?
I hate this planet already.
Why does anybody fight over anything? There's money to be made.
The name's Skavak. I'm picking up those blasters in your cargo hold. Excuse the rush, but I need to get out of here quick.
This village used to be safe, but the separatists are taking over. If I were you, I'd haul jets as soon as we're done.
Who are these people? What are they after?
What's with these separatists?
Separatists want to break away from the Republic. Judging by all the explosions, they're serious about the idea.
Is there someplace else I can land on Ord Mantell?
And go where?
This is the last free spaceport in the region. There's no place else to land unless you're Republic military.
Hurry up, then.
Sounds like the bombing is getting closer. The separatists will be right on top of us any minute.
We don't want to be here when they reach this docking bay.
Can the separatists get inside here?
How safe are we?
No, it's locked down tight--but if the separatists surround us, we'll be trapped.
Neither of us is going anywhere until I get my credits.
Pay me now.
What do the separatists need with a docking bay?
They want this place?
Need has nothing to do with it. The separatists just don't want anyone else having it.
Here's your payment for making this run, Captain. Soon as I have those blasters, you'll be free to fly.
Skavak! We've got a big problem. Separatists took over the local air defense cannon!
Whoa! Slow down, slow down, Corso. What are you talking about?
They deployed some kinda remote control stations. Hijacked the cannon's targeting computer. Damn separatists just destroyed an incoming Republic transport!
I'm sure the Republic troops will get everything under control.
The soldiers can handle it.
They've already got their hands full. Separatist rocket launchers just attacked a Republic walker. Knocked it down hard.
So?
Don't you get it? The separatists can attack any starship coming in or out of here.
Who are you?
Huh? Oh--Corso Riggs. I'm with Skavak. Nice to meet you.
With those remote control stations, the separatists can override the air defense cannon's computer--turn that firepower against us any time they want!
That's bad news, Captain. The separatists will blast you out of the sky if you even think about taking off.
There's no way out of this mess... except maybe destroying the remote control stations. But that's a job for a crazy person.
How about you help me destroy those things?
Or crazy people.
Sorry, but our job is to get these blasters out before this place falls to the enemy.
It'll be fun.
I admire your spirit, but don't expect us to tag along.
Sounds like suicide.
Then you might be here a while--at least until the separatists bomb this hangar.
I'll help you, Captain. I want to show the separatists my new best friend. Check out this blaster--I call it "Torchy."
Forget it, Corso. We need to get those blasters to the people who need them. She can take care of herself. No offense, Captain.
Forget it, Corso. We need to get those blasters to the people who need them. He can take care of himself. No offense, Captain.
I make suicide runs in my sleep.
None taken.
I hear it's easier that way.
If I don't come back alive, I'm gonna be extra angry.
I can't believe this.
Thanks for nothing.
This isn't personal, it's business. We've got our own problems.
Sorry I can't go with you, Captain. Whatever you're gonna do, you'd better hurry.
The separatists have remote control stations all over the area. You'll probably have to hit several before they lose control of that cannon.
I should charge extra for my thrilling heroics.
I'm not getting paid enough.
Pardon me, but my trigger finger needs a little exercise.
Time for some mayhem.
If I die, I want to be buried with my ship.
Here's my last request....
Good luck. Hope we see you again.
Let's move, Corso. We're running out of time.
I'm taking a little breather from all the explosions outside. Hope you don't mind.
